              <div class="Grid-cell">
                <div class="ProfileSidebar ProfileSidebar--withLeftAlignment">
  <div class="ProfileHeaderCard">
  <h1 class="ProfileHeaderCard-name">
    <a href="/TeamRanil" class="ProfileHeaderCard-nameLink u-textInheritColor js-nav">Team Ranil</a><span class="ProfileHeaderCard-badges"><a href="/help/verified" class="js-tooltip" target="_blank" title="Verified account" data-placement="right" rel="noopener"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></a></span>
  </h1>

  <h2 class="ProfileHeaderCard-screenname u-inlineBlock u-dir" dir="ltr">
    <a class="ProfileHeaderCard-screennameLink u-linkComplex js-nav" href="/TeamRanil">
      <span class="username u-dir" dir="ltr">@<b class="u-linkComplex-target">TeamRanil</b></span>
    </a>
  </h2>

  

      <p class="ProfileHeaderCard-bio u-dir" dir="ltr">Official account for the Office of Ranil
Jayawardena, M.P. for North East Hampshire. This account is run by his staff to provide updates on his activity.</p>

      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-location u-hidden">
        <span class="Icon Icon--geo Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-locationText u-dir" dir="ltr">
              

        </span>
      </div>

      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-url ">
        <span class="Icon Icon--url Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-urlText u-dir">  <a class="u-textUserColor" target="_blank" rel="me nofollow noopener" href="https://t.co/O8mHZIUCc6" title="http://www.Ranil.UK">
    Ranil.UK
  </a>

</span>
      </div>



      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-joinDate">
        <span class="Icon Icon--calendar Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-joinDateText js-tooltip u-dir" dir="ltr" title="5:20 am - 22 Aug 2017">Joined August 2017</span>
      </div>

      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">What would be the priority sectors moving forward that will mutually benefit both <a href="/hashtag/UK?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>UK</b></a> &amp; <a href="/hashtag/SL?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>SL</b></a>?

Watch <a href="/TeamRanil" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="899969417718661120"><s>@</s><b>TeamRanil</b></a> discuss his new role as the Trade Envoy to <a href="/hashtag/SL?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>SL</b></a> &amp; on the trade &amp; investment priorities going forward<a href="https://t.co/2zce8iyZ7i" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://youtu.be/s_00vtLtBOM" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://youtu.be/s_00vtLtBOM"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">youtu.be/s_00vtLtBOM</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Team Ranil Retweeted Department for International Trade</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Ranil asked <a href="/GregHands" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="125270251"><s>@</s><b>GregHands</b></a> how UK can improve US ties *right now* as well as future FTA<img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f1fa-1f1f8.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Flag of the United States" aria-label="Emoji: Flag of the United States" />

Minister highlights trade &amp; *investment*, incl. tech from Utah, Denver &amp; Seattle, as attractive UK attributesfree markets, universities, low taxare flourishing and will remain after Brexit.<a href="https://t.co/h3W2ThDFYT" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/tradegovuk/status/971336804396883969" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/tradegovuk/status/971336804396883969"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/tradegovuk/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/971336804396883969</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Team Ranil added,</p>

    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Department for International Trade</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>tradegovuk</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">.<span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="125270251"><s>@</s><b>GregHands</b></span> is appearing before the International Trade Select Committee to discuss the Trade Remedies Authority. <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/UJs7wnlSo9</span></div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Team Ranil Retweeted Int Trade Committee</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Ranil asked Minister <a href="/GregHands" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="125270251"><s>@</s><b>GregHands</b></a> at <a href="/CommonsIntTrade" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="787957858512044032"><s>@</s><b>CommonsIntTrade</b></a> if it was <a href="/tradegovuk" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14431752"><s>@</s><b>tradegovuk</b></a>'s intention to "get the very best" representation on the proposed new UK Trade Remedies Authority and if it remained their intention to have the TRA up and running by March 2019.

Minister confirmed yes.<img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/2705.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="White heavy check mark" aria-label="Emoji: White heavy check mark" /><a href="https://t.co/iYUpjs4Xul" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/CommonsIntTrade/status/971322317191213056" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/CommonsIntTrade/status/971322317191213056"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/CommonsIntTrad</span><span class="invisible">e/status/971322317191213056</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Team Ranil added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/CommonsIntTrade/status/971322317191213056" data-conversation-id="971322317191213056" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="971322317191213056" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="CommonsIntTrade" data-user-id="787957858512044032" href="/CommonsIntTrade/status/971322317191213056" data-conversation-id="971322317191213056" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">
      <div class="QuoteMedia-container js-quote-media-container">

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Today we are taking evidence from <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="125270251"><s>@</s><b>GregHands</b></span> on UK-US Trade Relations and UK Trade Remedies Authority.       </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>

  <ul>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Team Ranil Retweeted Greg Hands</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">The Minister of State for Trade Policy <a href="/GregHands" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="125270251"><s>@</s><b>GregHands</b></a> will be appearing before Ranil on the <a href="/CommonsIntTrade" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="787957858512044032"><s>@</s><b>CommonsIntTrade</b></a> from 10:00 am today. You can watch Ranil put questions to him on UK trade and consumer choice here: <a href="https://t.co/oboOLCASkd" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://goo.gl/yvq3KX" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://goo.gl/yvq3KX"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">goo.gl/yvq3KX</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/K5sRz9gxy8" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/GregHands/status/971303992138653704" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/GregHands/status/971303992138653704"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/GregHands/stat</span><span class="invisible">us/971303992138653704</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Team Ranil added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

</small>

          <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--more js-more-ProfileTweet-actions">
    <div class="dropdown">

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">A great piece by Tory MP Ranil Jayawardena <a href="/TeamRanil" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="899969417718661120"><s>@</s><b>TeamRanil</b></a> on <a href="/BrexitCentral" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="760506665728892928"><s>@</s><b>BrexitCentral</b></a> today about how the consumer can and must be king when it comes to trade policy post-Brexit<a href="https://t.co/B8gA3PLA0A" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://brxcen.com/2Fmtly8" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://brxcen.com/2Fmtly8"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">brxcen.com/2Fmtly8</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/TeamRanil" data-user-id="899969417718661120">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/913400838038663172/y7B1hG-E_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">

    <div class="PlayableMedia-player&#10;        &#10;        " data-playable-media-url="" data-use-react-player="" data-border-top-left-radius="" data-border-top-right-radius="" data-border-bottom-left-radius="" data-border-bottom-right-radius="" style="padding-bottom: 56.25%; background-image:url('https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DXHxakjUQAEPDDo.jpg')">
    </div>

        <div class="PlayableMedia-externalUrlBlockContent">
          <div class="PlayableMedia-title">PMQs: The difference between a customs union and a customs arrangement</div>
          <div class="PlayableMedia-description">Theresa May explains how the government would like to have a good trading relationship with the EU and wants to have trading arrangements "around the world"</div>

    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Hampshire County Council</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>hantsconnect</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">We've filled over <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/33-20e3.png" draggable="false" alt="3" title="Keycap digit three" aria-label="Emoji: Keycap digit three" /><img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/30-20e3.png" draggable="false" alt="0" title="Keycap digit zero" aria-label="Emoji: Keycap digit zero" /><img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/30-20e3.png" draggable="false" alt="0" title="Keycap digit zero" aria-label="Emoji: Keycap digit zero" /><img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/30-20e3.png" draggable="false" alt="0" title="Keycap digit zero" aria-label="Emoji: Keycap digit zero" /> of these salt bins for communities to help themselves, making pavements &amp; smaller access roads less icy for others, particularly in areas not covered by our main gritting routes </div>

Our Daughters video shows how our male MPs are championing the work of <a href="/hashtag/Women2Win?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Women2Win</b></a>: <a href="https://t.co/Z8Hy61hltN" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://vimeo.com/182703832" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://vimeo.com/182703832"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">vimeo.com/182703832</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a> <a href="/HuddlestonNigel" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="568249574"><s>@</s><b>HuddlestonNigel</b></a> <a href="/OliverHealdUK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="206263631"><s>@</s><b>OliverHealdUK</b></a> <a href="/TeamRanil" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="899969417718661120"><s>@</s><b>TeamRanil</b></a> <a href="/willquince" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="20473134"><s>@</s><b>willquince</b></a> <a href="/S_Hammond" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="47916280"><s>@</s><b>S_Hammond</b></a> <a href="/Baronessjenkin" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="334551644"><s>@</s><b>Baronessjenkin</b></a>  <a href="/VirginiaCrosbie" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="855455848377798657"><s>@</s><b>VirginiaCrosbie</b></a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Hear from UK Prime Minister's trade envoy for <a href="/hashtag/SriLanka?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>SriLanka</b></a> Ranil Jayawardena on BizFirst at 9.30 tonight. He speaks on the bilateral trading relationship, new opportunities for investment and his family ties to Sri Lanka.<a href="https://t.co/sgIapMxM9X" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/sgIapMxM9X</a></p>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">.<a href="/CeylonChamber" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="357992029"><s>@</s><b>CeylonChamber</b></a> Chief Economist <a href="/ShiranFdo" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="36029911"><s>@</s><b>ShiranFdo</b></a> had the opportunity of meeting and interviewing <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f1ec-1f1e7.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Flag of the United Kingdom" aria-label="Emoji: Flag of the United Kingdom" /> MP <a href="/ranil" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="930829985241280512"><s>@</s><b>ranil</b></a> Jayawardena for <a href="https://t.co/RF314Z40lr" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://Economy.lk" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://Economy.lk"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">Economy.lk</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a> on his new role as <a href="/theresa_may" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="747807250819981312"><s>@</s><b>theresa_may</b></a>'s Trade Envoy to <a href="/hashtag/SL?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>SL</b></a> and on the trade and investment priorities going forward. 

Await full interview!<a href="https://t.co/wYGejDTXbB" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/wYGejDTXbB</a></p>
</div>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards  has-content&#10;" data-tweet-id="949197947878559744" data-item-id="949197947878559744" data-permalink-path="/ThomasAnumeha/status/949197947878559744" data-conversation-id="949197947878559744" data-tweet-nonce="949197947878559744-4affaa36-0603-4d16-9d73-1b0e32dfe7a9" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="964132970981445632" data-retweeter="TeamRanil" data-screen-name="ThomasAnumeha" data-name="AnumehaThomas" data-user-id="862272159476965376" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;862272159476965376&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;ThomasAnumeha&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;AnumehaThomas&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;AnumehaThomas&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;AnumehaThomas&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;899969417718661120&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;TeamRanil&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Team Ranil&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Team Ranil&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Team Ranil&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-has-cards="true">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">UK parliamentary group that arrived in <a href="/hashtag/SriLanka?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>SriLanka</b></a> noticed significant progress the nation has made in strengthening democracy &amp; developing economy within past 3yrs. The delegation's visit is aimed at strengthening relations b/w both the countries to promote trade &amp; investment.<a href="https://t.co/aSzNByDTP4" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/aSzNByDTP4</a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">UK delegation visits <a href="/hashtag/EDB?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>EDB</b></a> 
A group of UK Parliamentarians headed by MP Ranil Jayawardena visited EDB recently and discussed the current trade scenario and the future potential to strengthen the trade relationships between the two countries.
Find out more: <a href="https://t.co/664rwZNnpn" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://goo.gl/i7sQ12" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://goo.gl/i7sQ12"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">goo.gl/i7sQ12</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/hSwAppNd9E" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/hSwAppNd9E</a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">British Prime Minister Theresa May has appointed Ranil Jayawardena, MP, as her trade envoy for <a href="/hashtag/SriLanka?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>SriLanka</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/LKA?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>LKA</b></a>. He will be visiting Sri Lanka from Feb 15-17th <a href="/UKinSriLanka" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="80016395"><s>@</s><b>UKinSriLanka</b></a> <a href="/TeamRanil" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="899969417718661120"><s>@</s><b>TeamRanil</b></a><a href="https://t.co/BDPmjb9IkO" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/BDPmjb9IkO</a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">UK MP Ranil Jayawardena has been appointed as trade envoy for <a href="/hashtag/SriLanka?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>SriLanka</b></a> and will be in Colombo 15  17 February. 

As trade envoy he will support and enhance the development of Britains trade and investment with Sri Lanka. 

<a href="/hashtag/UKSL70?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>UKSL70</b></a>

For more info:
<a href="https://t.co/cVJ23ndi2S" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.gov.uk/government/news/british-prime-minister-appoints-trade-envoy-for-sri-lanka" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.gov.uk/government/news/british-prime-minister-appoints-trade-envoy-for-sri-lanka"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">gov.uk/government/new</span><span class="invisible">s/british-prime-minister-appoints-trade-envoy-for-sri-lanka</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/aFd6DXW7U2" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/aFd6DXW7U2</a></p>
</div>

I take it you didn't like my poem?         <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">PX's new report argues that attempting to maintain the position of current industries thru tariffs harms consumers by preventing innovation. It also advocates pursuing mutual recognition of regulation, rather than harmonisation, after <a href="/hashtag/Brexit?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Brexit</b></a> <a href="https://t.co/Cj73A3qJO4" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.cityam.com/280409/trade-push-think-tanks-conservatives-ear-unilateral" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://www.cityam.com/280409/trade-push-think-tanks-conservatives-ear-unilateral"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">cityam.com/280409/trade-p</span><span class="invisible">ush-think-tanks-conservatives-ear-unilateral</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a> via <a href="/CityAM" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="45840503"><s>@</s><b>CityAM</b></a></p>
</div>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Team Ranil Retweeted Conservatives</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Ranil just asked at <a href="/hashtag/PMQs?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>PMQs</b></a> for confirmation of what progress has been made in reducing the attainment gap between less well off secondary pupils and their peersto ensure all children get the opportunity to succeed<img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f469-200d-1f3eb.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Female teacher" aria-label="Emoji: Female teacher" /><img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f468-200d-1f3eb.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Male teacher" aria-label="Emoji: Male teacher" />regardless of who they are or where they are from.<a href="https://t.co/QIyfjkEtMs" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/Conservatives/status/958677921207668738" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/Conservatives/status/958677921207668738"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/Conservatives/</span><span class="invisible">status/958677921207668738</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Team Ranil added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Our reforms to education have narrowed the gap between disadvantaged secondary school pupils and their peers - helping children from all backgrounds go as far as their talents will take them. <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>PMQs</b></span> <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/V5OVHhwvU1</span></div>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="958662608588038144" data-item-id="958662608588038144" data-permalink-path="/TeamRanil/status/958662608588038144" data-conversation-id="958662608588038144" data-tweet-nonce="958662608588038144-5c8d2f23-d9b6-431f-bc00-235393856efd" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="TeamRanil" data-name="Team Ranil" data-user-id="899969417718661120" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="CommonsIntTrade" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;899969417718661120&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;TeamRanil&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Team Ranil&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Team Ranil&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Team Ranil&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;787957858512044032&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;CommonsIntTrade&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Int Trade Committee&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Int Trade Committee&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Int Trade Committee&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/TeamRanil" data-user-id="899969417718661120">

    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate ">Team Ranil</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>TeamRanil</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Team Ranil Retweeted Int Trade Committee</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Ranil pressed the <a href="/CommonsIntTrade" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="787957858512044032"><s>@</s><b>CommonsIntTrade</b></a> witness further on their estimatesdiscerning that over half the figure actually relates to exports to foreign consumers; further much of any cost increase on cars sold to UK consumers would likely be absorbed by manufacturers<img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f697.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Automobile" aria-label="Emoji: Automobile" />

  </div>

      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Ranil backs the good that government can do focusing on strengthening and growing the economyup 17% since 2010<img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f4c8.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Chart with upwards trend" aria-label="Emoji: Chart with upwards trend" /><img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/2b06.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Up-pointing arrow" aria-label="Emoji: Up-pointing arrow" />and helping create more good jobs<img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f468-200d-1f3ed.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Male factory worker" aria-label="Emoji: Male factory worker" /><img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f469-200d-1f527.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Female mechanic" aria-label="Emoji: Female mechanic" /><img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f468-1f3fd-200d-1f4bc.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Male office worker (Medium skin tone)" aria-label="Emoji: Male office worker (Medium skin tone)" /><img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f469-1f3ff-200d-1f52c.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Female scientist (Dark skin tone)" aria-label="Emoji: Female scientist (Dark skin tone)" />.

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Would you like to hear an update on, or find out more about, Ranil's work for you in <a href="/UKParliament" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="6467332"><s>@</s><b>UKParliament</b></a>?
You can find out where and when Ranil's next, free, public Q&amp;A will be here: <a href="https://t.co/FopBpW894w" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/o/the-office-of-ranil-jayawardena-mp-12759123010" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/o/the-office-of-ranil-jayawardena-mp-12759123010"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">eventbrite.co.uk/o/the-office-o</span><span class="invisible">f-ranil-jayawardena-mp-12759123010</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a> <a href="/hashtag/RanilJayawardena?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>RanilJayawardena</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/TellRanil?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>TellRanil</b></a></p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Employment is HIGH<img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/2b06.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Up-pointing arrow" aria-label="Emoji: Up-pointing arrow" /> in Ranil's constituency too!
The number of unemployment benefits claimants in North East Hampshire is DOWN<img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/2b07.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Down-pointing arrow" aria-label="Emoji: Down-pointing arrow" /> almost two thirds since 2010plus NEH is the constituency in third place, both for lowest claimant rate<img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f949.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Third place medal" aria-label="Emoji: Third place medal" />and lowest number of youth claimants<img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f949.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Third place medal" aria-label="Emoji: Third place medal" />. <a href="/hashtag/ONS?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ONS</b></a><a href="https://t.co/rTwWVrVRbA" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/Conservatives/status/956196596047400961" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/Conservatives/status/956196596047400961"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/Conservatives/</span><span class="invisible">status/956196596047400961</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Fairfax UK Retweeted Department for International Trade</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The PM has approved two new Trade Envoys: 
<img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f449.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Hand from back with index finger pointing right" aria-label="Emoji: Hand from back with index finger pointing right" /> Ranil Jayawardena for Sri Lanka <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f1f1-1f1f0.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Flag of Sri Lanka" aria-label="Emoji: Flag of Sri Lanka" /> 
<img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f449.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Hand from back with index finger pointing right" aria-label="Emoji: Hand from back with index finger pointing right" /> <a href="/julianknight15" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1271714653"><s>@</s><b>julianknight15</b></a> for Mongolia <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f1f2-1f1f3.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Flag of Mongolia" aria-label="Emoji: Flag of Mongolia" />

There are now 30 parliamentarians covering 59 markets helping to promote UK businesses and <a href="/hashtag/FreeTradeUK?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>FreeTradeUK</b></a> around the world.</p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Team Ranil Retweeted PCC Hampshire &amp; IOW</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Ranil believes in keeping our country safe &amp; giving the police the right resources and powers to do their job. <a href="/ukhomeoffice" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="138037459"><s>@</s><b>UKHomeOffice</b></a> has listened and given <a href="/HantsPCC" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="377909292"><s>@</s><b>HantsPCC</b></a> the ability to raise 9.6m / year more for Hampshire.
Please share your views in the consultation!<a href="https://t.co/NJSffRs17V" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/HantsPCC/status/953933052820049920" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/HantsPCC/status/953933052820049920"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/HantsPCC/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/953933052820049920</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

He believes that the EU's precautionary approach to regulation is not consistent with the US's science-based approach. <a href="/hashtag/UKUSTrade?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>UKUSTrade</b></a><a href="https://t.co/KORrcOstln" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/KORrcOstln</a></p>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/FactCheck" data-user-id="15143541">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/611124076602621953/eaecY1p__bigger.png" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">C4 News FactCheck</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>FactCheck</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">
  <a href="/FactCheck/status/952966827017154561" class="tweet-timestamp js-permalink js-nav js-tooltip" title="10:12 am - 15 Jan 2018" data-conversation-id="952966823011635200"><span class="_timestamp js-short-timestamp " data-aria-label-part="last" data-time="1516039971" data-time-ms="1516039971000" data-long-form="true">Jan 15</span></a>
</small>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Dominic Raab told <a href="/bbcquestiontime" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="20699709"><s>@</s><b>bbcquestiontime</b></a> last week that the government will put 12bn more into the <a href="/hashtag/NHS?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>NHS</b></a> this year than in 2010. He's right.<a href="https://t.co/yDpyUNHzry" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/yDpyUNHzry</a></p>
</div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Interested in how <a href="/number10gov" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="963912251068571648"><s>@</s><b>Number10gov</b></a>'s <a href="/hashtag/IndustrialStrategy?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>IndustrialStrategy</b></a> will benefit Hampshire's businesses?

Ranil recently asked the <a href="/beisgovuk" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="45205091"><s>@</s><b>BEISGovUK</b></a> Minister how it would; you can read their answer to Ranil below:<a href="https://t.co/f0rR7EkK44" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/f0rR7EkK44</a></p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Given the President of the Board of Trade's clear and repeated commitments to continuing our existing trade deals, Ranil pushed the <a href="/CommonsIntTrade" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="787957858512044032"><s>@</s><b>CommonsIntTrade</b></a> witness on whether his *claim* that <a href="/LiamFox" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="532241033"><s>@</s><b>LiamFox</b></a> &amp; <a href="/tradegovuk" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14431752"><s>@</s><b>tradegovuk</b></a> are not prioritising them was actually just <a href="/hashtag/FakeNews?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>FakeNews</b></a>. <a href="/hashtag/RanilJayawardena?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>RanilJayawardena</b></a><a href="https://t.co/0hBLe9shbL" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/CommonsIntTrade/status/951000658165030913" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/CommonsIntTrade/status/951000658165030913"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/CommonsIntTrad</span><span class="invisible">e/status/951000658165030913</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/TeamRanil" data-user-id="899969417718661120">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/913400838038663172/y7B1hG-E_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">Team Ranil</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>TeamRanil</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Ranil has just sat on the Committee banning microbeads used in cosmetics and personal care products. Ranil said, It is great that this Conservative government is demonstrating commitment to protect the environment and the health of animals once again with real action.<a href="https://t.co/evOFWRi9ZB" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/evOFWRi9ZB</a></p>

        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">That was the year that was - a lookback at an extraordinary 12 months in politics.           <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Team Ranil Retweeted Int Trade Committee</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Ranil asked the <a href="/CommonsIntTrade" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="787957858512044032"><s>@</s><b>CommonsIntTrade</b></a> witness if he stands by his statement that grandfathering the Korea, CETA, Singapore and Peru trade agreements will be relatively easy - he answered yes. <a href="/hashtag/RanilJayawardena?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>RanilJayawardena</b></a><a href="https://t.co/VlKdB5GUEo" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/CommonsIntTrade/status/938359433658355714" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/CommonsIntTrade/status/938359433658355714"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/CommonsIntTrad</span><span class="invisible">e/status/938359433658355714</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Team Ranil Retweeted Int Trade Committee</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Ranil will be at <a href="/CommonsIntTrade" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="787957858512044032"><s>@</s><b>CommonsIntTrade</b></a> from 10:00 am today asking questions about the great opportunities for UK trade after Brexit; tune in live: <a href="https://t.co/5PNrn7Nqvb" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://goo.gl/rnr1mg" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://goo.gl/rnr1mg"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">goo.gl/rnr1mg</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a> <a href="/hashtag/RanilJayawardena?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>RanilJayawardena</b></a><a href="https://t.co/XPYEYCLciO" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/CommonsIntTrade/status/938099404585783296" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/CommonsIntTrade/status/938099404585783296"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/CommonsIntTrad</span><span class="invisible">e/status/938099404585783296</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       has-cards  has-content&#10;" data-tweet-id="936236766658482176" data-item-id="936236766658482176" data-permalink-path="/TeamRanil/status/936236766658482176" data-conversation-id="936236766658482176" data-tweet-nonce="936236766658482176-925c1884-6f60-44fe-aad0-22a8cbf21710" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="TeamRanil" data-name="Team Ranil" data-user-id="899969417718661120" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="tradegovuk" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;899969417718661120&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;TeamRanil&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Team Ranil&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Team Ranil&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Team Ranil&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;14431752&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;tradegovuk&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Department for International Trade&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Department for International Trade&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Department for International Trade&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-has-cards="true">

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/TeamRanil" data-user-id="899969417718661120">

  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Ranil has been pushing Ministers hard on the roll-out of 30 hours free childcare. Register NOW for a place for your child in January: <a href="https://t.co/pZYi7fTd3x" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://childcarechoices.gov.uk" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://childcarechoices.gov.uk"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">childcarechoices.gov.uk</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a> <a href="/hashtag/childcare?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>childcare</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/choices?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>choices</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/30hours?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>30hours</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/RanilJayawardena?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>RanilJayawardena</b></a><a href="https://t.co/1OdVqHrRJC" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/1OdVqHrRJC</a></p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Looking forward to our participation.  UK will be represented in Ottawa by Danielle Rowley MP <a href="/DaniRowley" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="35791604"><s>@</s><b>DaniRowley</b></a> &amp; Ranil Jayawardena MP who are keen to meet counterpart <a href="/hashtag/YoungMPs?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>YoungMPs</b></a><a href="https://t.co/AI7QS8yO7D" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/IPUparliament/status/930797848232423426" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/IPUparliament/status/930797848232423426"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/IPUparliament/</span><span class="invisible">status/930797848232423426</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">BGIPU added,</p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Team Ranil Retweeted Int Trade Committee</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Ranil will be questioning witnesses at <a href="/CommonsIntTrade" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="787957858512044032"><s>@</s><b>CommonsIntTrade</b></a> from 10:00 am today: <a href="https://t.co/ZvbqqvR55x" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://goo.gl/ZiMquY" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://goo.gl/ZiMquY"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">goo.gl/ZiMquY</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a> <a href="/hashtag/RanilJayawardena?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>RanilJayawardena</b></a><a href="https://t.co/grOO7suksr" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/CommonsIntTrade/status/930472881598943232" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/CommonsIntTrade/status/930472881598943232"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/CommonsIntTrad</span><span class="invisible">e/status/930472881598943232</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Team Ranil added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/CommonsIntTrade/status/930472881598943232" data-conversation-id="930472881598943232" aria-hidden="true">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Department for International Trade Retweeted Department for International Trade</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">UK goods and services exports to non-EU countries are booming <a href="https://t.co/uoC4oJu0kI" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://ow.ly/7mJU30giLWI" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://ow.ly/7mJU30giLWI"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">ow.ly/7mJU30giLWI</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/1IF46U65Vx" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/tradegovuk/status/925378547442704385" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/tradegovuk/status/925378547442704385"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/tradegovuk/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/925378547442704385</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Department for International Trade added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/tradegovuk/status/925378547442704385" data-conversation-id="925378547442704385" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="925378547442704385" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="tradegovuk" data-user-id="14431752" href="/tradegovuk/status/925378547442704385" data-conversation-id="925378547442704385" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">
      <div class="QuoteMedia-container js-quote-media-container">
          <div class="QuoteMedia-singlePhoto">
    <div class="QuoteMedia-photoContainer js-quote-photo" data-image-url="https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DNeayJWX4AERrjE.jpg" data-element-context="platform_photo_card" style="background-color:rgba(46,54,64,1.0);" data-dominant-color="[46,54,64]">

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    

    

  </div>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="920922849480728576" data-item-id="920922849480728576" data-permalink-path="/TeamRanil/status/920922849480728576" data-conversation-id="920922849480728576" data-tweet-nonce="920922849480728576-10f21be7-4edd-4358-a755-7bccfd558f35" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="TeamRanil" data-name="Team Ranil" data-user-id="899969417718661120" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="CommonsHomeAffs" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;899969417718661120&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;TeamRanil&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Team Ranil&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Team Ranil&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Team Ranil&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;976273940&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;CommonsHomeAffs&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Home Affairs Committee&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Home Affairs Committee&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Home Affairs Committee&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Team Ranil Retweeted UK Prime Minister</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Ranil raised EU nationals' rights-to-stay with the Home Secretary on multiple occasions when a Member of <a href="/CommonsHomeAffs" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="976273940"><s>@</s><b>CommonsHomeAffs</b></a>. <a href="/hashtag/RanilJayawardena?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>RanilJayawardena</b></a><a href="https://t.co/zC8Q0wXe4M" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/Number10gov/status/920918469956325376" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/Number10gov/status/920918469956325376"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/Number10gov/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/920918469956325376</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Team Ranil added,</p>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="920651847144222720" data-item-id="920651847144222720" data-permalink-path="/TeamRanil/status/920651847144222720" data-conversation-id="920651847144222720" data-tweet-nonce="920651847144222720-e92d0947-0f3d-49f4-8deb-8ece95456c9a" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="TeamRanil" data-name="Team Ranil" data-user-id="899969417718661120" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="CommonsProcCom" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;899969417718661120&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;TeamRanil&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Team Ranil&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Team Ranil&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Team Ranil&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;976241269&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;CommonsProcCom&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Procedure Committee&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Procedure Committee&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Procedure Committee&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/TeamRanil" data-user-id="899969417718661120">

        <div class="list-editor">

      </label>

    <script nonce="" id="track-ttft-body-script">
  if(window.ttft){
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('page', document.getElementById('swift-page-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('section', document.getElementById('swift-section-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('client_record_time', window.ttft.now());
  }
</script>
